data.name: WIC Schouten Expedition
data.desc: WIC send Pieter Schouten to reconnoitre and raid Sp, who surveys Main and islands, and sacks and destroys Ma hamlets, marking first of Old WIC’s Great Designs in the Caribbean
data.locn: Zeeland, Cape Verde, Barbados, St. Martin, Tierra Firme, Silán, Sisal, Haiti, Sp Jam, Cuba
data.prim_n: WIC 1.05.01.01, 1 / Laet [missg] = Laet/Naber 1 36-[missg] / Wassenaer 7 154-155 / Wright D 1 p *101
data.note: = First Old WIC squadron to enter Caribbean, dropped anchor at St. Martin on 5 Oct 1624 /v Goslinga 259
